title: Gold 3 Support - S9 P3 Peak - Looking For ADC  or Jungler for Duo.
body:
Hello all, 

I'm a support main climbing my way to Diamond, currently in promos for gold 3. I'm looking for a super aggressive jungler / or adc for solo queue.

Requirements:

Must have discord & microphone 
English Only 
Formally Plat or high Gold. 
Wanting to push, in improvement and team work.
Not toxic at all.

Champion Pool: Thresh / Bliz / Leona / Alistair / Braum / Pyke / Naud / Lulu 

IGN: Niege
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/niege
OP.GG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=niege
OCE Server.

Thanks.

replies.body: Look, im not as good as you but no one on here meets my preferences etc, so im only asking for a chance.
